trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of cells that are selected in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de células que estão selecionadas num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The order of cells in the collection is not guaranteed to match the order in which they were selected.
trans-unit.target: A ordem das células na coleção não é assegurada para corresponder a ordem em que foram selecionados.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: Limpa a coleção.

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Este método não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>classe diretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: To clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClearSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para limpar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClearSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClearSelection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: Sempre emitida.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified cell is contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a célula especificada está contida na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> localizar no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: if dataGridViewCell is in the ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if dataGridViewCell is in the ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> array, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os elementos da coleção especificada para <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> matriz, que começa no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: A matriz unidimensional do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que é o destino dos elementos copiados da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: A matriz tem de ter a indexação com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero `array` em que copiar começa.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayé multidimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the is greater than the available space from index to the end of array.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o número de elementos a é superior ao espaço disponível desde o index ao fim do array.

trans-unit.source: The cannot be cast automatically to the type of array.
trans-unit.target: O não pode ser convertido automaticamente para o tipo de array .

trans-unit.source: Inserts a cell into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Insere uma célula na coleção.

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Este método não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.target: Não é possível alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>classe diretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>

trans-unit.target: Para adicionar uma célula para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>

trans-unit.target: O índice no qual `dataGridViewCell` devem ser inseridos.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>classe diretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: To remove a cell from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para remover uma célula do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.Collections.IList>interface.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do item a remover.

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: Sempre emitida.
